thread.title: General Mills to buy Blue Buffalo for $8 bln

title: General Mills to buy Blue Buffalo for $8 bln
text:
General Mills to buy Blue Buffalo for $8 bln Friday, February 23, 2018 - 01:34 
Cheerios cereal maker General Mills will buy Blue Buffalo Pet Products for nearly $8 billion to tap demand for natural pet food and offset falling sales for processed items. Aleksandra Michalska reports.   
Cheerios cereal maker General Mills will buy Blue Buffalo Pet Products for nearly $8 billion to tap demand for natural pet food and offset falling sales for processed items. Aleksandra Michalska reports.  //reut.rs/2EO6Cih
